tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had root canal treatment done by Dr.Sharanya on my 2nd molar, which had been an issue for years since my childhood. She also fixed other cavities during the process. It was all perfectly done in just 3 appointments.

Her patience, professionalism, and precision were truly exceptional. She displayed remarkable talent and skill throughout the entire procedure, ensuring I was comfortable and well-informed at every step. I am extremely grateful for the fantastic care and highly recommend this clinic to anyone with dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Writing my feedback after more than a month of completing my treatment. 

I was suffering from tooth pain caused due to cavities for about 3 years and was skipping the RCT thinking it was painful, risky and expensive as I had no idea what it was. I couldn't eat and skipped many of my favourite food like popcorn or non veg food items or ice cream for years as these gave me sleepless nights due to to tooth pain.  

As the pain started becoming unbearable I chose to visit Dr. Sharan's Dental clinic with lot of hesitation. I had fear of the scary Root Canal therapy and was looking to request for some temporary pain killing fix. 

But after visiting the clinic, Doctor madam helped me understand all the issues and patiently explained what and how it needs to be fixed. I had accepted for root canal for 4 tooth and also asked for tooth cleaning. The most impressive part of the whole treatment was that the RCT didn't even pain a tiny bit for any of the 4 tooth. I felt absolutely no pain during the treatment or the next day or days after the treatment. And within next few days I was able to happily eat anything I like with no pain. I am extremely satisfied with the treatment and the results and I am grateful to madam for fixing one of my greatest problems of my life which is to eat comfortably without pain. I almost forgot I had tooth pain for a month now. Thank you! 😊

There were no issues with wait times, I had to step in right on the time of my appointment and almost I could walk in without any waiting. The fees was also affordable and far less compared to the fees collected from the other clinics. This has to be the best dental clinic for our area. I will highly recommend anyone with dental problems to visit this clinic and get your tooth fixed !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Sharanya  is very friendly and clearly explaining the various treatment options.  I'm happy and satisfied with the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extraordinary experience at Dr.Sharans dental care. I was keeping my severely damaged decayed tooth for 4 years and managing pain when ever I get pain because of my fear towards teeth removal for pain. Now I got extreme pain and I couldn't able to tolerate it and went through Google for best dentist near me. l luckily found Dr.Sharan's dental care and I consulted Dr.Sharanya and explained my fear. I have heard that in olden days that doctor way for talking to the patient and treating the with utmost care will sure half of our problems. I had the same feeling with her she spoke very soft and kind and made me comfortable for teeth removal , it was very painless not even 1% pain I had. I am totally alright now and my fear towards teeth removal is totally gone. I  200% recommend Dr.Sharanya mam in kodungaiyur she gives one of the best service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,
review: I had gone to Dr. Sharan dental care, for root canal treatment (RCT). Though I was scared a bit, she explained the problem clearly and convinced me. Truly, she is able to listen from patients perspective, which differentiates her from other dentists that I have visited. Appointments were honoured and if there are any delays due to emergencies, she rings up to inform. Overall, the experience of RCT was great, thanks to her experience and awesome care. The crown was a 100% perfect fit, with almost no rework. I also had few cavities to be filled. She shows comparison of images, before and after filling. There was even a follow up call, after the treatment. It was indeed, a great place for dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Teeth Decay, Teeth cleaning & polishing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr. Sharanya did an excellent job. Last month I visited Dr. Sharanya clinic for my tooth decay and she allowed me to explain my problem fully and then she started  examining  my teeth and explained the problem clearly. I was worried about pain however she made me feel comfortable explains the process and treated me very well. Now I don’t see any decay in my teeth and she fixed it. She’s very well trained and professional, I recommend this doctor for everyone. Thank you so much Dr. Sharanya.. 😊

review:
I had discomfort in my wisdom tooth for a while, which i had ignored. I went in for just a consultation on the issue, but Dr. Sharanya explained the situation and suggested that the removal of wisdom tooth would be the best option. 
To be frank I was quite nervous and sceptical about getting the tooth extracted. But doc gave me the assurance that it would be a simple painless procedure. Everything was done within 15 mins and I was given medications to be taken till the followup. 
Followup was done promptly (got my teeth cleaned too) and overall the experience was great.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I just cannot express my gratitude in words about Dr Sharanya hari and both the nurse at Sharon's  Dental clinic.  I went to them in absolute pain in my tooth with an infected filling / cleaning/ gap filling. Sharan clinic is really different and every staff member is so caring and the place is absolutely clean and per all the covid processes. The way evening staff nurse welcoming the visitors, treating them and not making us to wait for long time . Kudos and gratitude to the entire team of Sharon's clinic and Dr.sharanya hari . special thanks for making the whole process so very simple and affordable
